resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107534</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107534</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206240</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bonneville Power Administration's Resources for Teachers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebsmittel der Bonneville Energie Leitung für
Lehrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les ressources de la gestion de puissance de 
Bonneville pour des professeurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos da administração da potência de 
Bonneville para professores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse della gestione di potenza di Bonneville 
per gli insegnanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαχειριστικοί πόροι δύναμης Bonneville για τους 
δασκάλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos de la administración de la potencia de 
Bonneville para los profesores</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Includes lessons on energy conservation, energy efficiency, geothermal energy, water and electricity, stream environments and stream health, aquatic macroinvertebrates, and the life cycle of salmon. High school students can conduct an energy audit of their school.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schließt Lektionen auf Energieerhaltung, 
Energie-Leistungsfähigkeit, geothermische Energie, Wasser und 
Elektrizität, Stromumgebungen und Stromgesundheit, 
Wassermacroinvertebrates und der Lebenszyklus der Lachse ein. 
High School Kursteilnehmer können eine Energierevision ihrer 
Schule leiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inclut des leçons sur l'économie d'énergie, 
l'efficacité énergétique, l'énergie géothermique, l'eau et 
l'électricité, les environnements de jet et la santé de jet, les 
macroinvertebrates aquatiques, et le cycle de vie des saumons. 
Les étudiants de lycée peuvent conduire un audit d'énergie de
leur école.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inclui lições no conservation de energia, a 
eficiência de energia, energia geothermal, água e eletricidade, 
ambientes do córrego e saúde do córrego, macroinvertebrates 
aquáticos, e o ciclo de vida dos salmões. Os estudantes da 
High School podem conduzir um exame da energia de sua escola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Include le lezioni su risparmio energetico, 
rendimento energetico, energia geotermica, acqua ed elettricità, 
ambienti del flusso e salute del flusso, macroinvertebrates acquatici 
ed il ciclo di vita dei salmoni. Gli allievi della High School 
possono condurre una verifica di energia della loro scuola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιλαμβάνει τα μαθήματα στην ενεργειακή συντήρηση, 
την ενεργειακή αποδοτικότητα, τη γεωθερμική ενέργεια, την ύδρευση
και την ηλεκτρική ενέργεια, τα περιβάλλοντα ρευμάτων και την 
υγεία ρευμάτων, τα υδρόβια macroinvertebrates, και τον κύκλο 
ζωής του σολομού. Οι σπουδαστές γυμνασίου μπορούν να 
διεξαγάγουν έναν ενεργειακό λογιστικό έλεγχο του σχολείου τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Incluye lecciones en la conservación de energía,
rendimiento energético, energía geotérmica, agua y electricidad, 
los ambientes de la secuencia y salud de la secuencia, los 
macroinvertebrates acuáticos, y el ciclo vital de salmones. Los
estudiantes de la High School secundaria pueden conducir una 
intervención de la energía de su escuela.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206240</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107534</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/bonneville-power-administrations-resources-for-teachers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
